tableDescription.description: Runes can be found and only be applied by a deity if multiple variables align. This alignment depends on the rune, and the current month we are in. For example a good aligned rune can not be applied if we are in a month named after a bad aligned deity. This alignment also differs for the Runemaster's own religion. Evil aligned deities to themselves are good.
